definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of arcuate nucleus had obvious pathologic changes.
sentences.chinese: 弓状核超微结构出现明显病理学改变。

sentences.english: Many of these hormones act at a brain region in the hypothalamus called the arcuate nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 这些激素作用在丘脑下部的被称为弓状核的大脑区域。

sentences.english: Inhibitory effect of electroacupuncture attenuated partly after the des troy to ARC.
sentences.chinese: 损毁弓状核后，电针对胃的抑制效应减弱。

sentences.english: The sharply defined east contour of this building evokes the image of the bow of a ship.
sentences.chinese: 这幢建筑东面的造型使人想起了船的弓状外形。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to hunch over/to stoop/to arch one's back (upward)
shape resembling the character 八 or 8/V-shape/splayed/figure of eight
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
